00043 std::string TShapeSize2DB2::get_name() const
00044   { return "TShapeSize2DB2"; }
00045 
00046 TShapeSize2DB2::~TShapeSize2DB2() {}
00047 
00048 bool TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00049                                double& result, 
00050                                MsqError& err )
00051 {
00052   const double two_det = 2.0 * det(T);
00053   if (invalid_determinant(two_det)) { // barrier
00054     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00055     return false;
00056   }
00057     
00058   const double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00059   result = (frob_sqr - 2.0 * sqrt( frob_sqr + two_det ) + 2.0)/two_det;
00060   return true;
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00064                                          double& result, 
00065                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00066                                          MsqError& err )
00067 {
00068   const double d = det(T);
00069   if (invalid_determinant(d)) { // barrier
00070     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00071     return false;
00072   }
00073   const double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00074   const double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00075   const double v = frob_sqr - 2.0 * psi + 2.0;
00076   result = v / (2*d);
00077 
00078     // deriv of V wrt T
00079   MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00080   MsqMatrix<2,2> v_wrt_T(T);
00081   if (psi > 1e-50)
00082   {
00083     v_wrt_T *= (1.0 - 1.0/psi);
00084     v_wrt_T -= 1.0/psi * adjt;
00085     v_wrt_T *= 2;
00086   }
00087   else
00088   {
00089     std::cout << "Warning: Division by zero avoided in TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate_with_grad()" << std::endl;
00090   }
00091   
00092     // deriv of mu wrt T
00093   deriv_wrt_T = v_wrt_T;
00094   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5/d;
00095   deriv_wrt_T -= v / (2*d*d) * adjt;
00096   
00097   return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00101                                          double& result, 
00102                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00103                                          MsqMatrix<2,2> second[3],
00104                                          MsqError& err )
00105 {
00106   const double d = det(T);
00107   if (invalid_determinant(d)) { // barrier
00108     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00109     return false;
00110   }
00111   const double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00112   const double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00113   const double v = frob_sqr - 2.0 * psi + 2.0;
00114   result = v / (2*d);
00115 
00116     // deriv of V wrt T
00117   MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00118   MsqMatrix<2,2> v_wrt_T(T);
00119   if (psi > 1e-50) 
00120   {
00121     v_wrt_T *= (1.0 - 1.0/psi);
00122     v_wrt_T -= 1.0/psi * adjt;
00123     v_wrt_T *= 2;
00124   }
00125   else
00126   {
00127     std::cout << "Warning: Division by zero avoided in TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate_with_hess()" << std::endl;
00128   }  
00129   
00130     // deriv of mu wrt T
00131   deriv_wrt_T = v_wrt_T;
00132   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5/d;
00133   deriv_wrt_T -= v / (2*d*d) * adjt;
00134   
00135     // second of V wrt T 
00136   const double s = T(0,1) - T(1,0);
00137   const double tr = trace(T);
00138   const double f = -2.0/(psi*psi*psi);
00139   second[0](0,0) = second[1](0,1) = second[2](1,1) =  f*s*s;
00140   second[0](0,1) = second[0](1,0) = second[1](1,1) = -f*s*tr;
00141   second[1](0,0) = second[2](0,1) = second[2](1,0) =  f*s*tr;
00142   second[0](1,1) = second[2](0,0) = -(second[1](1,0) = -f*tr*tr);
00143   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 2 );
00144   
00145     // second of mu wrt T 
00146   const double x = 1.0/(2*d);
00147   second[0] *= x;
00148   second[1] *= x;
00149   second[2] *= x;
00150   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, v/(-2*d*d) );
00151   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, v/(d*d*d), adjt );
00152   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -1/(2*d*d), v_wrt_T, adjt );
00153   
00154   return true;
00155 }
